title: Normal Ping and FPS but I am still lagging????
body: I just want to fix this, I have updated my drivers and such but nothing changes I am super confused and appreciate all help

replies.body: Can you dive into more specifics on what *Lag* means in this instance? This word is often used to mean different things to different people, so if you could dive into more detail, I'll be able to understand what's going on and how to fix it.

It is like fine for a few seconds then I can't see abilities go off properly for instance a morgana q hit me at short distance and I saw it go full range and then I got the stun effect. And the games gets skippy and it looks like fps drops but my fps is normal

Ah, that makes more sense. What you're describing are really common symptoms seen from *Packet Loss* issues. We may have to eventually look at your network routing to find the culprit, but I'd first like you to work through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) so we can confirm your local network settings are in good standing.

Let me know if this helped.

He made a post because he didn't want to read through the entire connection guide to find out which ports to forward or what firewalls are causing the interruption or whatever the actual issue is. I know because I'm experiencing the same thing and don't want to read the entire connection guide. I think it's a Windows 10 problem but I feel better blaming Riot because they have less money.

I'd like to say this happened to me as well. Had good connection and very high fps and the game would skip around like I had packet loss. This was very annoying. The thing that finally fixed it was upgrading windows 10. I was using home edition and upgraded to education edition I got from my university. Education is basically Enterprise Edition. Not sure what the problem was maybe a bad install or something, but this worked. Hope it helps
